headline: INFICON THIN FILM DEPOSITION CONTROLLER
description: Thin Flim Deposition Controller    Uses EIES sensor technology and provides complete automatic control of two materials, either sequential or codeposited vacuum processes
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Deposition Equipment > Other Physical Vapor Deposition Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Inficon
Model SENTINEL III
Description Thin Flim Deposition Controller
Other Information System Components:
Control unit: P/N 753-003-G1
Sensor control unit: P/N 753-200-G1
2 Photomultiplier detector assemblies: P/N 016-350-G1
Beam splitter: P/N 016-204-G1
EIES sensor with feedthrough: P/N 753-002-G13 sensor to feedthrough 45" length.
12/12 Input/Output relay interface
Analog output (rate)
RS232 interface
Power Requirements 120/240 V 1.5 A 0.8 A(2) 60 Hz 1 Phase
Weight 38 lb (17 kg)
